snippet: The case highlights the difficulties women face finding safe transportation in New Delhi, a city already perceived as dangerous for them.
abstract: Court in Delphi, India, sentences former Uber driver Shiv Kumar Yadav to life in prison after he was found guilty in October of rape, kidnapping and other charges related to attack on female passenger.
lead_paragraph: The case highlights the difficulties women face finding safe transportation in New Delhi, a city already perceived as dangerous for them.

headline.main: Former Uber Driver in India Gets Life Sentence for Rape
